sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The libpng package contains libpng libraries and libpng-config.

sect3.title: png libraries
sect3.para: The PNG library is a collection of routines used to create and manipulate PNG format graphics files. The PNG format was designed as a replacement for GIF and, to a lesser extent, TIFF, with many improvements and extensions and lack of patent problems.

sect3.title: libpng-config
sect3.para: libpng-config provides configuration info for libpng.
